He is named in the twenty-second wave of mystery pack toys and collector cards. The collector card states about Wolfgang Canter, "He listens to music with friends." He is a character called "Violist Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Rarity's Retro Revolution" event. The game's description of him states, "A recognized master of the alto clef: If music was cooking, then he'd be a great chef!" His cutie mark is a yellow double quaver.

characters.name: Wylin Slobinzki
characters.description: Appears in The Gift of the Maud Pie in an upper-story Manehattan window. Shares his body style and eye color with Rogue, "Real Article", and S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17.

characters.name: Mr. Zippy
characters.description: An apparently very short-sighted pony who is put in his place by "New Fluttershy" when he delivers the wrong mail to her cottage in Putting Your Hoof Down. He later appears without glasses in Magical Mystery Cure and on the IDW comics' Friendship is Magic Issue #30 page 6.

characters.name: S01E03 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Waits in line with "Chilly Puddle" during Applejack's fantasy in The Ticket Master, converses with "Chilly Puddle" in The Cutie Mark Chronicles, has a visible cutie mark of what appears to be two hearts in Simple Ways, has a visible cutie mark of a bunch of purple grapes in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, and has a visible cutie mark of a pair of mountain peaks on the IDW comics' Friendship is Magic Issue #45 page 3. Shares the same design as Golden Harvest and Daisy.

characters.name: S01E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Seen singing in Winter Wrap Up. Similar to Sweetie Drops.

characters.name: S01E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Seen singing in Winter Wrap Up. Same model as Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is three carrots.

characters.name: S01E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Seen singing in Winter Wrap Up. Same model as Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is three carrots.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: A pony seen in the background of the first fashion show in Suited For Success, behind Spike.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: A pony seen in the background of the first fashion show in Suited For Success, behind Spike.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: A pony seen in the background of the first fashion show in Suited For Success, behind Spike. Shares her eye style with Pinkie Pie, Lily Valley, Bumblesweet, Tealove, WCE Unnamed Mare - Jester, and Magazine Unnamed Mare - Swirl. Her mane appears to be an unfinished design.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: A pony seen in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #6
characters.description: A pony seen in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during At the Gala in The Best Night Ever, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Resembles Golden Harvest and Caramel Apple in color scheme.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #7
characters.description: A pony seen in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Resembles Apple Bytes in color scheme.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #13
characters.description: Appears in Suited For Success. Shares her mane style with Minuette, Sea Swirl, Peachy Pitt, Silver Spanner from the front, "Fuchsia Fizz", "The Inquisitor", "Perfect Timing", S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2, S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, "Red Rose", S02E22 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #7, S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1, S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, and Issue 08 Unnamed Mare - Hourglass.

characters.name: S02E03 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: She is shown chasing after Twilight Sparkle's doll, Smarty Pants, in Lesson Zero. Has the same design as S05E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #4, "Apple Bottom", and S06E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, the same tail style and cutie mark as Golden Harvest, Spring Forward, "Serena", "Maroon Carrot", S01E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #4, S01E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #5, and "Berry Icicle", and a similar color scheme to Sprinkle Medley, "Melody", Micro 04 Unnamed Mare - Pegasus Artist, "Larissa", Friends Forever 11 Unnamed Filly - Medley, and Unnamed Girl #16. Her cutie mark is three carrots.

characters.name: S02E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Hearth's Warming Eve, The Washouts, and 2, 4, 6, Greaaat. Implicitly attracted to Rolling Thunder. Identical to Shoeshine in all but mane-and-tail color and cutie mark. Her cutie mark is two flowers.

characters.name: S02E17 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears once during the song The Perfect Stallion in Hearts and Hooves Day, standing between "Ruby Pinch" and "Written Script". Also appears in Between Dark and Dawn. Shares her cutie mark and mostly color scheme with Sweetie Drops, whose cutie mark is identified by Little, Brown's Mini Pony Collector's Guide and Gameloft's mobile game respectively as three candies and as three bows.

characters.name: S04E07 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in flashbacks in Bats!, Leap of Faith, and No Second Prances. Shares her design and at least the design of her cutie mark with "Bonnie", and shares at least the design of her cutie mark with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #8. Her cutie mark appears to be a key.

characters.name: S04E07 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in a flashback in Bats!, as one of the actresses in the Bridleway musical Hinny of the Hills in Rarity Takes Manehattan, and in another flashback in Leap of Faith.Shares her design with "Paisley Pastel". Her cutie mark is three paisley designs.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Also appears in Equestria Games, Made in Manehattan, Uprooted, Between Dark and Dawn, Growing Up is Hard to Do, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Shares her design and eye color with S09E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #1 and resembles S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #9, Cherry Blossom, and Cheerilee.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Also appears in Equestria Games, Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, Once Upon a Zeppelin, Between Dark and Dawn, Growing Up is Hard to Do, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Shares her design and cutie mark with Daisy, and shares her design with Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is two white flowers.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Rarity Takes Manehattan, in Ponyville in Tanks for the Memories, and in Manehattan again in Made in Manehattan and The Saddle Row Review. Resembles Sweetie Drops, and shares her design with Luckette. Her cutie mark usually appears to be threeâ€‹[â€‹dubiousÂ â€“Â discussâ€â€‹]â€‹ bowsâ€‹[â€‹specifyâ€‹]â€‹ and rarely is a dark blue horseshoe and another horseshoe interlocked.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #10
characters.description: One of Suri Polomare's models in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Appears again in Made in Manehattan and The Gift of the Maud Pie. In Simple Ways, the drawing of the fashion show seemingly depicts her along with the other models. Shares her mane style and color with S05E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #13
characters.description: One of Rarity's models in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Also appears in The Gift of the Maud Pie, Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8, and Rarity's Peek Behind the Boutique episode 2. In Simple Ways, the drawing of the fashion show seemingly depicts her along with the other models.

characters.name: S04E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears together with "Ponet" at the Star Swirl the Bearded Traveling Museum in Three's A Crowd. Resembles Pinny Lane.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Shares her design with Daisy and Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is a rainbow.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Pride, next to Crusoe Palm multiple times. Shares her design and cutie mark with Daisy, shares her design with Golden Harvest, and shares her color scheme with "Blueberry Swirl". Her cutie mark is two white flowers.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears at the pizza party in Pinkie Pride. Shares her design with Daisy and Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is a rainbow.

characters.name: S04E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Filli Vanilli. Shares her design with Cherry Berry, Berryshine, and Berry Dreams. Resembles Jonagold in color scheme. Her cutie mark is a blue crescent.

characters.name: S04E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Seen at Ponyville's Day Spa in Filli Vanilli. Shares her coat and mane colors and cutie mark with S06E07 Unnamed Earth Mare #2 and has a similar color scheme to "Mint Swirl". Her cutie mark is a group of seven bubbles, the same as that of Derpy.

characters.name: S04E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Seen at Ponyville's Day Spa in Filli Vanilli. Shares her design with Cherry Berry, Berry Dreams, and Berryshine. Her cutie mark is two white flowers.

characters.name: S04E19 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Sweetie Belle's dream in For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils. Shares her design, eye color, and outfit design with Eclair CrÃ¨me, and her mane style, coat color, and outfit design with "Beyond".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith with a bandaged head, in Equestria Games, in Parental Glideance, and in The Washouts. Shares her design with Berry Dreams, Cherry Berry, and Berryshine. Her cutie mark is a bunch of white grapes.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 4. Shares her design, eye color, and sometimes cutie mark with Screwy. Her cutie mark is three baby bottles.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Appears suffering from hooferia in a picture in Leap of Faith. Her cutie mark is a crenelated tower.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in a standee picture both in the episodes Trade Ya! and Stranger Than Fan Fiction and in the storybook Welcome to Rainbow Falls!

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design, eye color, and cutie mark design with "Posey Petals" and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #12, shares her design and eye color with Apple Bumpkin, Perfect Pie, and "Sun Streak", and shares her design with "Sunfire". Her cutie mark is two flowers.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #8
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and cutie mark with Sweetie Drops, whose cutie mark is identified by Little, Brown's Mini Pony Collector's Guide and Gameloft's mobile game respectively as three candies and as three bows, shares her design and cutie mark design with Grape Delight, shares her design with Shoeshine, Luckette, Lilac Links, and Sunny Smiles, and has a similar color scheme to G1 Rep's nurse pony disguise.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #9
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design with Daisy and Golden Harvest, and resembles Cherry Blossom, Cheerilee, and S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #1.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #10
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design with Daisy and Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is three balloons, the same as that of Pinkie Pie.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #11
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and eye color with Candy Apples, "Peach Melba", "Creamcup", and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #23, shares her design with "Jinx", and has a similar color scheme to Issue 40 Unnamed Filly - Heart Flower, Zappityhoof, and Unnamed Girl #1.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #12
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design, eye color, and cutie mark with "Posey Petals", shares her design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #4, shares her design and eye color with Apple Bumpkin, Perfect Pie, and "Sun Streak", and shares her design with "Sunfire". Her cutie mark is two flowers.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #14
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and flower design with Golden Harvest, and shares her design with Daisy. Her cutie mark is two dolphin silhouettes.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #16
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her mane style, eye color, and accessories with Royal Ribbon and "Sweet Dreams", shares her mane style, eye color, and accessory designs with S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #10 and S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #11, and shares her mane style, eye color, and saddle with "Strawberry Lime".

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #17
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and eye color with Apple Dumpling and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #22, and shares her color scheme with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #18
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and eye color with Gala Appleby and "Salt Water", shares her design with Apple Honey and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #20, and shares her mane style with S01E16 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a horseshoe.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #19
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya!, twice at once with different coat colors and cutie marks. Shares her design with Golden Harvest and Daisy, shares her mane color and, in one instance, coat color and cutie mark with "Toffee", Caramel, and "Creme Brulee", and has, in one instance, a similar color scheme to Unnamed Boy #20. One of her cutie marks is three horseshoes.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #20
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya!, twice at once with different coat colors and cutie marks, at the Canterlot library in Amending Fences, and in Ponyville in Triple Threat. Shares her design and eye color with Apple Honey, shares her design with Gala Appleby, S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #18, and "Salt Water", and shares her mane style and eye color with S01E16 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1. One of her cutie marks is a raining cloud, and the other of her cutie marks is a pink flamingo.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #22
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and eye color with Apple Dumpling and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #17.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #23
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and eye color with Candy Apples, "Peach Melba", "Creamcup", and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #11, and shares her design with "Jinx".

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears at the Crystal Empire in Equestria Games. Shares her design and outfit design with Lavender Bloom and "Soft Spot", shares her mane and tail style with "Ivy Vine", and shares her tail style with Golden Harvest. Her cutie mark is a gem.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, between S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3 and "Blue October / Blueberry Muffin", in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, and in The Washouts. Shares her design with Berry Dreams, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, Cherry Berry, and Berryshine, and shares her mane and tail style with Cherry Spices.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares her design with Sweetie Drops, Shoeshine, Luckette, Grape Delight, Lilac Links, and Sunny Smiles, and shares her mane and tail style with S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5, S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6, and S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, between Strawberry Ice and Lyra Heartstrings. Shares her design with S05E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, S02E03 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, "Apple Bottom", and S06E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, shares her mane and tail style and color with Twinkleshine, and shares her mane and tail style with Lemon Hearts and Apple Stars.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, between "Night Knight" and Royal Riff. Shares her design with Berry Dreams, Berryshine, Silver Berry, Cherry Berry, and "Oakey Doke".

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, next to Sunshower Raindrops. Shares her design with Rose and "Sunset Bliss", shares her mane and tail style and colors with Amethyst Star and Banana Fluff, and shares her mane and tail style with Lyra Heartstrings, Diamond Mint, Lemony Gem, and Silverspeed.

characters.name: S04E26 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Appleloosa in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2 and speaking with Apple Cobbler in My Little Pony The Movie. Shares her design with Apple Fritter, Jonagold, Lavender Fritter, "Raspberry Glaze", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #10, and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #15. Her cutie mark appears to be a purple, orange, and yellow-striped rainbow. Voiced by Rhona Rees.

characters.name:
Passerby Pony
S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, Fame and Misfortune, Sparkle's Seven, Common Ground, The Summer Sun Setback, and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her design, eye color, and attire with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #11 and her color scheme, skirt-and-bloomers design, and partly mane style with S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #2. Has an Aunt Bay Mare. Her cutie mark is a flower of the same appearance as her skirt pattern's flowers. Voiced by Claire Corlett in Appleoosa's Most Wanted and Tabitha St. Germain in Growing Up is Hard to Do.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, Sparkle's Seven, Common Ground, The Summer Sun Setback, and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her design with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #19.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, My Little Pony Best Gift Ever, Sparkle's Seven, Common Ground, The Summer Sun Setback, and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her design with "Penny Ante" and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #12. Her cutie mark is three aces.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail, Buckball Season, Fame and Misfortune, Sparkle's Seven, Common Ground, The Summer Sun Setback, and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her color scheme and cutie mark with S08E21 Unnamed Earth Mare #2. Her cutie mark is a blue bow. Voiced by Claire Corlett in Appleoosa's Most Wanted and by Andrea Libman in Fame and Misfortune.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #8
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. She shares her design with Apple Munchies, Apple Cider, Peachy Sweet, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #16, and Canterlot Shopkeep, at least the design of her cutie mark and mostly her color scheme with "Bonnie", at least the design of her cutie mark with S04E07 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, and mostly her color scheme with "Turf". Her cutie mark is a key.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #9
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season. Shares her design with "Yuma Spurs", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #14, and Wrangler.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #10
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. She shares her design with Apple Fritter, Jonagold, Lavender Fritter, S04E26 Unnamed Earth Mare #1, "Raspberry Glaze", and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #15. Her cutie mark is three blue horseshoes.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #11
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her design, eye color, and attire with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #1 and her eye color, skirt design, and partly mane style with S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #2.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #12
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season. Shares her design with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #3 and "Penny Ante". Her cutie mark is three aces.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #13
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her design with S05E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #1.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #14
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her design with "Yuma Spurs", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #9, and Wrangler. Her cutie mark is a spur.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #15
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. She shares her design with Apple Fritter, Jonagold, Lavender Fritter, S04E26 Unnamed Earth Mare #1, "Raspberry Glaze", and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #10. Her cutie mark is a pumpkin.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #16
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. She shares her design with Apple Munchies, Apple Cider, Peachy Sweet, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #8, and Canterlot Shopkeep. Her cutie mark is a pie.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #19
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season. Shares her design with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #2.

characters.name:
Gleeful Rodeo Clown
S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #20
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares her color scheme with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #14. Her cutie mark is a boot. She is a character called "Gleeful Rodeo Clown" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "Gleeful Rodeo Clown's talent lies in putting on shows -- but I bet you can tell just by looking at her nose!"

characters.name: S05E10 Unnamed Earth Mare #0
characters.description: Pony Mona Lisa. Depicted by the cutie mark of "Leonardo da Brinci" both in Princess Spike and in Gameloft's mobile game; earlier depicted by pictures in the IDW comics' My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #14 page 2 and Issue #22 cover A. A human version is depicted by cake filling during ACADECA in My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Friendship Games.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears on the train in the first six versions of the remastered opening sequence and in Dodge City in Party Pooped, these two roles having made her record-holder of length between opening-debut and episode-debut. Shares her design with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #13.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Resembles a "Petty Girl" on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Party Pooped. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Resembles someoneâ€‹[â€‹specifyâ€‹]â€‹ on the cover of Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band.

characters.name: S05E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #4

characters.name: S06E04 Unnamed Earth Mare #1

characters.name: S06E04 Unnamed Earth Mare #2

characters.name: S06E04 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in On Your Marks in the dance recital audience, as a unicorn in Newbie Dash, in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, in The Washouts as a unicorn, and in 2, 4, 6, Greaaat. Shares her design and cutie mark with Cherry Berry and her design with Berryshine. Her cutie mark is a pair of cherries.

characters.name: S06E07 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Newbie Dash as a Wonderbolts spectator, in Parental Glideance, in The End in Friend, and in The Washouts. Shares her color scheme and cutie mark with Tree Hugger.

characters.name: S06E07 Unnamed Earth Mare #2

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #2

characters.name: S06E11 Unnamed Earth Mare #1

characters.name:
Matronly Pony

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #1

Sometimes shares her design and eye color with "Burning passion" and her design with S06E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #9 and S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #3. Her cutie mark is two crossed feathers.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #4

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #5

characters.name: S06E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #6

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Earth Mare #2

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin, Grannies Gone Wild, The Point of No Return, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8.

characters.name:
Prim EEA Official
S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in School Daze - Part 1, Grannies Gone Wild, Friendship University, Common Ground, Between Dark and Dawn, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Her cutie mark is a partially rolled-up tube of toothpaste. She is a character called "Prim EEA Official" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during "The Crowning Achievement" event. Her in-game description states, "This scholar is POSITIVE that there's a correlation between intelligence and owning a lot of really cool capes. They're very slimming!"

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #6

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #8

Her body shape is similar to those of Princess Luna, Fleur de Lis, the Headless Horse, the Mane-iac, "Tropical Dream", Sassy Saddles, S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #9, and S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #10.

characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus as a burlesque dancer at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Her body shape is similar to those of Princess Luna, Fleur de Lis, the Headless Horse, the Mane-iac, "Tropical Dream", Sassy Saddles, S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #8, and S06E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #9.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Mare #3

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a doctor/surgeon at the Ponyville Hospital. Shares her design and mane and eye colors with S06E23 Unnamed Earth Mare #3.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Earth Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a doctor at the Ponyville Hospital.

characters.name:
Salespony

characters.name: S07E09 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in a photograph in Honest Apple as the model for Miss Pommel's fashions.

characters.name: S07E10 Unnamed Earth Mare #2

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #4

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #6

characters.name:
Ancient Villager Pony
S07E16 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Rockhoof's village in Applejack's story. She is a character called "Ancient Villager Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as an apple farmer in Rarity's story.

characters.name:
Random Villager
S07E18 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Shadow Play - Part 1, Road to Friendship, and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. Shares her design with S08E14 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1. She is a character named "Spangled Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states, "Those cool bracelets on her front leg are hoof-crafted. She likes the way they jingle when she walks." Voiced by Chiara Zanni.

characters.name:
Scholarly Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Shadow Play - Part 1, Road to Friendship, and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. Somewhat resembles Juniper Montage. She is a character called "Scholarly Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "This pony's nearsightedness doesn't lessen her love of classical literature. Her favorite is '1,001 Equestrian Nights'!"

characters.name: S07E18 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a bread seller in Somnambula's legend.

characters.name: S07E19 Unnamed Earth Mare #1

characters.name: S07E19 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You with a mane inspired by Rarity's look in Vanity Mare magazine. Shares her body model and eye color with "Feather Twirl" and her body model with "Frazzle Rock" and S08E01 Unnamed Earth Mare #0. Her cutie mark is a green book with a yellow ribbon bookmark.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild and Between Dark and Dawn. Shares her design and eye color with "Power Chord" and her mane and tail style and eye color with "Soaring Virtue".

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild. Her cutie mark is a roll of film.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience cosplaying as Twilight Sparkle. Her cutie mark is a cupcake and a piece of wrapped candy.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience cosplaying as Twilight Sparkle. Her cutie mark is two hearts and two cherries.

characters.name:
Canterlot Shopkeep
â€‹[â€‹specifyâ€‹]â€‹
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony The Movie. Shares her design with Peachy Sweet, Apple Munchies, Apple Cider, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #8, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #16, and Earth pony Dewdrop Dazzle. Her cutie mark appears to be a ribboned tambourine. Enterplay collectible card game Seaquestria & Beyond #58 C Canterlot Shopkeep, Traveling Salesmare states, "10% off percussive instruments, this week only at Tambourines, Tangerines, and Trampolines, conveniently located in downtown Canterlot!"

characters.name:
Chipper Hollowvian
S08E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a resident of Sire's Hollow. Her cutie mark is a mouse. She is a character called "Chipper Hollowvian" in Gameloft's mobile game; her bio states, "She really needs those glasses -- Sire's Hollow is chock full of antiquarian books to peruse!"

characters.name: S08E09 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Non-Compete Clause as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with "Berry Bliss" and her coat and mane colors with "Cotton Sky".

characters.name: S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, The Hearth's Warming Club, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, Dragon Dropped, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with "Raspberry Vinaigrette", her body design with S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3, and her cutie mark with S08E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1. Her cutie mark appears to be a crescent moon and three stars.

characters.name: S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, She's All Yak, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with Pursey Pink.

characters.name: S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals as a student at the School of Friendship. Also appears in The Washouts, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, What Lies Beneath, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, She's All Yak, The Last Crusade, 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, Daring Doubt, and The Ending of the End - Part 2. Shares her design with "Burning passion", S06E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #9, and sometimes S06E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a milkshake. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball in The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name:
Bluish-Pink Townspony
S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, The Last Crusade, Dragon Dropped, A Horse Shoe-In, Growing Up is Hard to Do, The Ending of the End - Part 2, The Last Problem, and Rarity's Biggest Fan as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her body design with "Lavender Sunrise" and S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5. Her cutie mark is an apple brown Betty. She is a character named "Bluish-Pink Townspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states, "That mane-do started out as an accident by an inexperienced stylist, but she is REALLY making it work." Voiced in The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name: S08E21 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her body design with "Nile Faras". Her cutie mark is two grains of wheat.

characters.name: S08E21 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place walking through Canterlot. Shares her color scheme and cutie mark with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #4. Her cutie mark is a blue bow.

characters.name:
Stepford Pony 2
S08E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in What Lies Beneath in a manifestation of Smolder's fears. Resembles "Stardom" and to a lesser extent Hoofer Steps. Voiced by Sunni Westbrook.

characters.name:
Pony Vendor 2
BGE Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever tending to birds and selling rhinestone necklaces. Resembles the pigeon lady in Home Alone 2: Lost in New York. She is a character called "Bird Whisperer Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game; her bio states, "More than happy to help you feed the birds -- at only two bits a bag!" Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: S09E04 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Sparkle's Seven in Rarity's fantasy sequence. Her cutie mark is a top hat.

characters.name: S09E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Between Dark and Dawn. Shares her design and eye color with S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #1 and her coat and eye colors with Twinkleshine, S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, and S05E02 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1.

characters.name:
Guard Pony 2

characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as one of the security guards at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Voiced by Tabitha St. Germain.

characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #8
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do attending the Appleloosa County Fair. Shares her color scheme, skirt-and-bloomers design, and partly mane style with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #1 and her eye color and skirt design with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #11. Resembles Dorothy Gale in The Wonderful Wizard of Oz and, by extension, S[...]t [...]immer on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #44's Fried Pie cover.

characters.name: S09E23 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Big Mac Question being terrorized by one of Discord's living apples. Shares her design with Lily Valley and her color scheme with "Surf". Her cutie mark is two linked horseshoes.

characters.name:
Forward-Thinking Friendship Student
S09E26 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a future student at the School of Friendship. She is a character named "Forward-Thinking Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and she serves as a boss battle helper during the "Prank to the Future" event. Her in-game description states "The School of Friendship's future student body consists of creatures of all kinds -- including many fillies from very close to home."

characters.name: S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Present during Princess Luna's return to Ponyville in Friendship is Magic, part 2, during Applejack's fantasy in The Ticket Master, during the talent show in The Show Stoppers, during the cider competition in The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000, with a visible cutie mark of what appears to be jacks and a ball in Simple Ways, and with a visible cutie mark of a bell in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Shares his design with Caramel, Golden Delicious, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, Wensley, BeauDe Mane, and Upper East Stride.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: A pony seen in the background of the first fashion show in Suited For Success, behind Spike.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: A pony seen in the background of the first fashion show in Suited For Success, behind Spike.

characters.name: S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: First appears in Over a Barrel. Later appears pulling a carriage away from the gala and offscreen in The Best Night Ever and on a Maretropolis street in Power Ponies, with S01E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. Also appears in P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View) as one of Rarity's porter ponies at Seaward Shoals. In Three's A Crowd, an otherwise unidentified stallion whose muzzle shape and coat and eye colors match Red Delicious, Goldengrape, "Fuzzy Slippers", S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9, and "Harry Trotter" equally makes a brief appearance as a security team member during Glass of Water. S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10 shares his design and eye color with S06E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6, his design with Caramel, Golden Delicious, Cherry Fizzy, Wensley, and Royal Riff, his color scheme and first cutie mark with Goldengrape and "Wisp", his color scheme with Red Delicious, his coat, eye, and partly mane and tail colors with Strike, and his coat and eye colors with "Fuzzy Slippers", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9, and "Harry Trotter". His cutie mark is first two bunches of green grapes and is later a lyre.

characters.name: S01E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears pulling a carriage away from the gala in The Best Night Ever and on a Maretropolis street in Power Ponies, with S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10. He shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark with Dr. Hooves, his design, eye color, and sometimes cutie mark with S06E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his coat and mane colors with Crusoe Palm. His cutie mark is an hourglass.

characters.name: S01E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears outside Canterlot Castle during At the Gala in The Best Night Ever. Shares his design with Cherry Fizzy, Upper East Stride, and S05E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13 and his body style and eye color with Gladmane, "Joe Pescolt", "Burlap", and S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design and partly colors with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, his body style, eyebrows, and eye color with Biff and S05E25 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his body style and eyebrows with "Quick Trim" and S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12 and "Temple Chant", his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, and his design and eye color with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, mane and eye colors, and cutie mark design with "Temple Chant", his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and his design and eye color with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design and partly colors with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2, his body style, eyebrows, and eye color with Biff and S05E25 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his body style and eyebrows with "Quick Trim" and S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13 and his body style and eye color with Gladmane, "Joe Pescolt", "Burlap", and S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Cosplayed as by S06E13 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2 in Stranger Than Fan Fiction. Shares his design and mane and eye colors with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15 and his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and "Temple Chant".

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, both at the beginning of the episode in Rainbow Dash's imagination and near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design and partly colors with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2, his body style, eyebrows, and eye color with Biff and S05E25 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his body style and eyebrows with "Quick Trim" and S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3 and "Temple Chant", his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, and his design and eye color with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, near the end of the episode. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6 and his body style and eye color with Gladmane, "Joe Pescolt", "Burlap", and S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7.

characters.name: S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15
characters.description: Appears at the Fortress of Talacon in Daring Don't, near the end of the episode. Shares his design and mane and eye colors with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7 and his design and eye color with S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and "Temple Chant".

characters.name: S04E07 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in a flashback in Bats!, as one of the actors in the Bridleway musical Hinny of the Hills in Rarity Takes Manehattan, and in another flashback in Leap of Faith. Shares his body type, tail style, and cutie mark with "Oregon Trail", his body type and mane style with Big McIntosh, "Creme Brulee", Emerald Ray, Magazine Unnamed Stallion - Newspaper Reporter, and Magazine Unnamed Stallion - Yoke, his color scheme with Derpy, his coat and mane colors with Hughbert Jellius and "Dipsy", and his cutie mark with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is a wagon wheel.

characters.name: S04E07 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in a flashback in Bats!, as one of the actors in the Bridleway musical Hinny of the Hills in Rarity Takes Manehattan, and in Granny Smith's flashback in Leap of Faith. Shares his design with "Happy Trails" and "Apple Core", and resembles BeauDe Mane. His cutie mark is three horseshoes.

characters.name:
Delegate 2
S04E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan refusing to give Rarity a taxi in Rarity Takes Manehattan, at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya!, at the Crystal Empire in Equestria Games, in Canterlot in Princess Spike, in Party Pooped, in Manehattan again in Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, The Saddle Row Review, Fame and Misfortune, It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, Shadow Play - Part 2, and Daring Doubt, and on the season 4 poster. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Shares his design, mane and eye colors, and usual cutie mark with Lucky Clover, shares his design and mane and eye colors with S05E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his design, eye color, and usual cutie mark design with "Melilot", shares his design and eye color with Dr. Hooves and "Eiffel", and shares his design with Meadow Song. His cutie mark usually is three four-leaf clovers and rarely is what appears to be a fedora. He is voiced by Brian Drummond in Rarity Takes Manehattan and voiced by Trevor Devall in Princess Spike.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears as a tourist in Manehattan in Rarity Takes Manehattan, at the Crystal Empire in Equestria Games, in Manehattan again in Made in Manehattan, in Las Pegasus in Viva Las Pegasus, in Manehattan again in Fame and Misfortune, on Iron Will's zeppelin in Once Upon a Zeppelin, with a speaking role in Molt Down, in Between Dark and Dawn, in Growing Up is Hard to Do, and on the season 4 poster. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Shares his tail style and cutie mark with Lucky Clover, shares his mane style and cutie mark with Felix, shares his tail style with Dr. Hooves, Meadow Song, and "Eiffel", and shares his mane style with Crusoe Palm, Noteworthy, and Goldengrape. His cutie mark is three four-leaf clovers. Voiced by Trevor Devall in Rarity Takes Manehattan and Michael Daingerfield in Molt Down.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, and The Saddle Row Review. Shares his design and eye color with "Sourpuss". His cutie mark is a horseshoe.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Shares his design and cutie mark with Crusoe Palm, and shares his design with Goldengrape, Noteworthy, and Felix. His cutie mark is a palm tree.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: A streamer vendor featured during the song Pinkie the Party Planner in Pinkie Pride, voiced by Brian Drummond. Also appears in Equestria Games. His cutie mark is a streamer and a pair of scissors.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: One of three Cheese Sandwich lookalikes shown during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride, the second lookalike in the lineup but the first lookalike to appear on screen.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: One of three Cheese Sandwich lookalikes shown during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride, the first lookalike in the lineup but the third lookalike to appear on screen. Also appears in Rarity's Peek Behind the Boutique episode 1. As Cheese Sandwich resembles "Weird Al" Yankovic, this pony resembles what "Weird Al" Yankovic looked like in the 1980s and 1990s.

characters.name: S04E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Simple Ways and gets switched to Savoir Fare in Inspiration Manifestation. His mane colors are similar to those of Princess Cadance and Cupcake.

characters.name: S04E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears twice at once in Simple Ways. Both instances wear the same suit, and the instance in the background additionally wears a hat. Resembles "Pristine".

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Plays a bowed string instrument in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, before getting switched to Wolfgang Canter in Inspiration Manifestation, and on the season 4 poster.

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Plays a plucked string instrument in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, before getting switched to Octavia Melody in Inspiration Manifestation, and on the season 4 poster. Shares his color scheme with Noteworthy and Astro Pony.

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Plays a brass instrument in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, before getting switched to Parish Nandermane in Inspiration Manifestation, and on the season 4 poster.

characters.name: S04E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: A bearded stallion who appears in Somepony to Watch Over Me and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. His cutie mark is three lilypads. A texture matching him has been included in the Gameloft mobile game's type04_master_01.pvr file.

characters.name: S04E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: A bearded stallion who appears at a table with "Duce Switchell" in Somepony to Watch Over Me. Also appears in Fame and Misfortune and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Resembles "Theodore Donald "Donny" Kerabatsos" except for cutie mark, beard, and mane style. His cutie mark is a green snake.

characters.name: S04E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Sweetie Belle's dream in For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils. Shares his design, eye color, and accessory design with "Star Gazer".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith and Equestria Games. Shares his design from an angle with Uncle Orange, shares his mane style from an angle with S04E10 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1, and shares his design from the front with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and others. His cutie mark is a blue leaf.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears suffering from mane loss in Leap of Faith.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears suffering from terrible tonsillitis in Leap of Faith. Shares one of his designs with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark switches between a laurel wreath, a horseshoe, and three four-leaf clovers.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears with an almost-hairless tail in Leap of Faith. Shares one of his mane styles with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark switches between a mouse and an apple.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears suffering from swollen hindquarters in Leap of Faith and Where the Apple Lies. Shares one of his designs with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark is a boot, the same as that of "Welly".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears suffering from swollen hooves in Leap of Faith. Shares his design with Dr. Hooves, Lucky Clover, Meadow Song, and others, and shares another of his mane styles with Noteworthy, Goldengrape, Crusoe Palm, and others. His cutie mark is a dark-colored G-clef.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears suffering from the Clydesdale fur blight in a picture in Leap of Faith. Has similar coat and mane colors to "Black Stone".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears suffering from horsentery in a picture in Leap of Faith. His cutie mark is a bone.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is a dolphin.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is two dolphins, the same as that of Sea Swirl.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13. His cutie mark is three drops of water.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: One of the competitors in the Ponyville Swim Meet in Leap of Faith. Shares his design and eye color with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, and S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12. His cutie mark is a group of seven bubbles, the same as that of Derpy.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and shares his coat and mane colors with Mane Moon.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! and at a train station in an alternate timeline in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his color scheme with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #17, and resembles G1 Ice Crystal. His cutie mark (hidden while he carries a bag but visible while he carries a box and lantern) is three brilliant-cut silver-colored gemstones.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, eye color, and hat with "Bushel", shares his design and eye color with "Apple Slice", and shares his design and hat design with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6. His cutie mark is two pairs of eighth notes.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, mane colors, cutie mark, and hat design with "Bushel", shares his design and hat design with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and shares his design with "Apple Slice". His cutie mark is a bucket.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design and eye color with Crusoe Palm and S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his design and cutie mark design with Felix, shares his design with Goldengrape and Noteworthy, and shares his coat and mane colors and cutie mark with Buddy. His cutie mark is three blue clovers.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design and mane color with Royal Riff, and shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, eye color, and accessories with Half Baked Apple, and shares his coat and mane colors and cutie mark with Crusoe Palm. His cutie mark is a palm tree.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya!, twice at once with different coat colors and cutie marks, and in Manehattan in The Gift of the Maud Pie. Shares his design, eye color, and accessory with Apple Split. One of his cutie marks is two pairs of backwards-facing eighth notes.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design, eye color, and outfit design with Davenport. His cutie mark is a gem.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, between Pegasus Emerald Green and pink-coated White Lightning, in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, in Road to Friendship, and in The Washouts. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, Golden Delicious, Wensley, BeauDe Mane, and Upper East Stride, and has a similar color scheme to Open Skies.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, shares his mane style with Doctor Horse, S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, and "Gary Coronet", and has a similar color scheme to Apple Cider.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, next to Royal Pin. His cutie mark is a yellow horseshoe.

characters.name: S04E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Appleloosa in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2 and is appearing in My Little Pony The Movie. Shares his design with Caramel, Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and shares his coat and mane colors with Apple Cobbler and "Cinnamon Sugar".

characters.name:
Delivery Pony
M2 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Rainbow Rocks as a pony delivering books from Princess Celestia to the Castle of Friendship's new library. Shares his mane, tail, and coat and sometimes eye colors with Felix, his mane, tail, and coat color with S06E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and his mane and tail with "Adante". Like "Package Deal", he is referred to as "Delivery Pony" in the end credits and voiced by Brian Drummond.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1 and The Cutie Map - Part 2.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Tanks for the Memories. He shares his design with Caramel, Wensley, Cherry Fizzy, Golden Delicious, and Royal Riff. His cutie mark is a laurel wreath.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears ice-skating in Tanks for the Memories.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears playing horse hockey in Tanks for the Memories and The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears playing horse hockey in Tanks for the Memories and The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears playing horse hockey in Tanks for the Memories and The Gift of the Maud Pie.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears, sometimes with a brown coat, as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, A Royal Problem, Sparkle's Seven, The Summer Sun Setback, and Growing Up is Hard to Do.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears, sometimes with a brown coat, as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season, Fame and Misfortune, Sparkle's Seven, Common Ground, The Last Crusade, The Summer Sun Setback, She Talks to Angel, and Growing Up is Hard to Do. His cutie mark is sometimes an red ascot and other times a guitar.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Resembles "Cormano". His cutie mark is two cherries.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. First appeared in the My Little Pony First Look and Find book, with slightly different tail and mane and eye colors. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark with Caramel, Upper East Stride, "Strawberry Cream", "Sour Drops", and S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is three blue horseshoes.

characters.name:
Jokester Clownspony
S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. In Three's A Crowd, an otherwise unidentified stallion whose muzzle shape and coat and eye colors match Red Delicious, Goldengrape, "Fuzzy Slippers", S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9, and "Harry Trotter" equally makes a brief appearance as a security team member during Glass of Water. S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9 shares his coat and eye colors with Red Delicious, Goldengrape, "Wisp", S01E21 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10, "Harry Trotter", and Strike. He is a character called "Jokester Clownspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "Saddle up and get ready for the show to start, because Jokester Clownspony knows the way to your heart!"

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. His cutie mark is a beach ball.

characters.name:
Lassoing Clownspony
S05E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares his design and eye color with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #14 and his structure and eye color with Big Daddy McColt and Short Fuse. His cutie mark is three water balloons. He is a character called "Lassoing Clownspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "With big purple hair and a heart that's true, if you need a friend... you need Lassoing Clownspony!"

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears in Trouble Shoes' flashback in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares his design and mane and eye colors with Meadow Song, his color scheme and cutie mark with "Oregon Trail", and his cutie mark with S04E07 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. His cutie mark is a wheel.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #14
characters.description: One of the rodeo clowns in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Shares his design and eye color with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11, his structure and eye color with Big Daddy McColt and Short Fuse, and his color scheme with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #20. His cutie mark is three water balloons.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat with Meadow Song and sometimes S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17. His cutie mark appears to be a guitar. Not to be confused with Noteworthy.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #16
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat with Goldengrape, his design, coat color, and cutie mark with S05E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, his design, eye color, and cutie mark with Neigh Sayer, his design and coat and eye colors with S05E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and his design and cutie mark with Don Neigh. His cutie mark is two bunches of green grapes.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17
characters.description: Appears as a spectator at the Appleloosa rodeo in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Buckball Season and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares sometimes his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat with Meadow Song and S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #15 and other times his design, eye color, cutie mark, and hat design with Noteworthy. His cutie mark is sometimes a guitar and other times appears to be two pairs of backwards-facing eighth notes.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #21
characters.description: Appears as a rodeo school judge in Trouble Shoes' flashback in the present in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his body type with Claude, Stinky Bottom, "Leadnail McColt", S06E03 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, "Port Wine", Coriander Cumin, "Mint Condition", and Cattail.

characters.name:
Jigging Clownspony
S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #22

Shares his design and mane and eye colors with Lucky Clover and S04E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, his design and eye color with Dr. Hooves, and his cutie mark with "Sunny Song". His cutie mark is a microphone and musical notes.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5

Represents Hasbro executive director Brian Lenard. His cutie mark is a vinyl record and two eighth notes.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7

Represents Michael Vogel, who liked a fan's September 27, 2015 Twitter reply of the pony's full name being "Banana von Tooningham". His cutie mark is three bananas.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8

In late September 2015, Jim Miller was asked "This guy was a 4chan cup shoutout I guess? pic.twitter.com/dR7OITvtRF" and answered "Nope! But I could see how you'd think so." His cutie mark is a soccer ball.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #9

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #11
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan as a cabbie in Made in Manehattan. His cutie mark is a wooden wheel.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #12
characters.description: Appears in a photo album in Made in Manehattan. His cutie mark is three carrots.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #13
characters.description: Appears in a photo album in Made in Manehattan. His cutie mark is a bowl and two mixing spoons.

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #17
characters.description: Appears in Manehattan in Made in Manehattan, The Gift of the Maud Pie, and The Saddle Row Review. Also appears in Fame and Misfortune, Grannies Gone Wild, and Daring Doubt. Listed within "More Manehattan Ponies" in the Ultimate Guide published by Orchard Books in the United Kingdom. In early April 2016, Mike P. Fox was asked "Who's[sic] idea was it for a Mr. Plinkett pony? Written in, or @TheBiggestJim 's[sic] team? pic.twitter.com/RgoCxtNAVt" and Jim Miller answered "I have no idea what you're talking about (also, that pony first appeared in 'Made in Manehattan' in S5) ðŸ˜‰". Shares his body style and eye color with Rogue, "Real Article", and "Wylin Slobinzki". His cutie mark appears to be three pizza rolls. Voiced by Michael Dobson.

Booth Barker

Masked Stallion

He is a character called "Masked Stallion" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Nightmare Night at the Museum" event. He also has a story role in the event, in which he claims to be a character named Grayson Eddy.

characters.name: S05E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1

It's 60 percent of his autobiography!"
