characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Rockhoof's village in Applejack's story.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Rockhoof's village in Applejack's story.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as an apple farmer in Rarity's story. His cutie mark is a seed sprout.

characters.name:
Grateful Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. He is a character called "Grateful Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Outdoorsy Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. He is a character named "Outdoorsy Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "This pony prefers earth tones--the better to blend in with the surrounding desert when he's out exploring."

characters.name: S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? up to thirty-six times at once as a servant of Prince Hisan in Somnambula's legend. His cutie mark is a red plant growth.

characters.name: S07E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You outside Mr. Breezy's fan store. His cutie mark is a paper fan.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild. His cutie mark is three balloons.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild. Shares his design with S08E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. His cutie mark is a volcano.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience wearing a Princess Cadance shirt. Shares his design with S08E14 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1 and his cutie mark design with S06E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. His cutie mark is a ringed planet.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Shadow Play - Part 2 as a Manehattan cabbie. Shares his design with "Evening Star", S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Shadow Play - Part 2 as a Manehattan cabbie. Shares his design with "Evening Star", S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, S06E23 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in flashback in Shadow Play - Part 2 during the Sirens' attack on a village in the Hollow Shades. Resembles Quasimodo in The Hunchback of Notre-Dame.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in flashback in Shadow Play - Part 2 during the Sirens' attack on a village in the Hollow Shades.

characters.name: S08E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Grannies Gone Wild at Flim and Flam's Las Pegasus resort. Resembles Rick Sanchez from Rick and Morty. His cutie mark is a glass beaker.

characters.name: S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a passenger on the Friendship Express. Identical to Crusoe Palm in all but coat color and cutie mark, shares his design and eye color with S04E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8 and his cutie mark with S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2, and resembles Meadow Flower. His cutie mark is a sunflower.

characters.name: S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a resident of Sire's Hollow.

characters.name:
Dapper Hollowvian
S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a resident of Sire's Hollow. He is a character called "Dapper Hollowvian" in Gameloft's mobile game; his bio states, "We'd say he's bringing bowties back to Sire's Hollow -- but they never left in the first place."

characters.name: S08E09 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Non-Compete Clause as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design and coat color with "Vellum Codex".

characters.name:
Chill Friendship Student
S08E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, The Last Crusade, The Summer Sun Setback, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design and eye color with S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and his design with S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. His cutie mark is a popsicle. He is a character named "Chill Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "His roommate would REALLY appreciate it if he'd start practicing kindness by doing the dishes in his dorm kitchen once in a while."

characters.name:
Sandbar's Dad
S08E15 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Hearth's Warming Club as Sandbar's father in his story. Also appears in The Ending of the End - Part 2. He is a character called "Sandbar's Dad" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "He doesnâ€™t care what anyone else says: HE thinks his sonâ€™s story about how his Hearthâ€™s Warming doll almost fell into the fire is GREAT." His cutie mark is a fish.

characters.name:
Tall Pony
S08E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Road to Friendship as an innkeeper in Somnambula. Shares his body type and eye color with "Turner McColt", Dandy Grandeur, "Snow Hope", and BGE Unnamed Earth Stallion #2 and his body type with Cheese Sandwich, "Mules Grassfield", and Mudbriar. He is a character named "Tall Innkeeper" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "His height makes it easier for him to see all the ponies waiting in line to book a room. It's usually a lot!" Voiced by Kathleen Barr.

characters.name: BGE Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever eating ice cream outside Carousel Boutique. His cutie mark is an ice cream cone.

characters.name:
Pony Vendor 1
BGE Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever running from Smoky and selling sewing machines. He is a character called "Northerly Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game; his bio states, "Raised in the frozen North by an adoptive family, this innocent young stallion isn't used to the hustle and bustle -- and raccoons -- of Ponyville." Shares his body type and eye color with "Turner McColt", Dandy Grandeur, "Snow Hope", and S08E19 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and his body type with Cheese Sandwich, "Mules Grassfield", and Mudbriar. Resembles Buddy the Elf from the film Elf; not to be confused with Buddy. Voiced by Sam Vincent.

characters.name:
Server Pony
S09E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Sparkle's Seven as a bartender in Rarity's fantasy sequence. Voiced by Brian Drummond.

characters.name:
Meathead Pony
S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return living in Dusty Pages' old house. His cutie mark is three red dumbbells. Voiced by Paul Dobson.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return mining in a silver mane. Shares his mane and eye color with Meadow Song.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return participating in a theatre performance at the Silver Stable Retirement Community.

characters.name: S09E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Common Ground competing in the Appleloosa buckball tournament. His cutie mark is three candies.

characters.name:
Guard Pony 1
S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as one of the security guards at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Voiced by Jesse Inocalla.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name:
Factory Pony
S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as one of the security guards at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Voiced.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory. Resembles Apple Cinnamon.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do during Being Big is All It Takes. Shares his body design with S06E20 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do operating the Ferris wheel at the Appleloosa County Fair. Shares his body model with Gizmo, "Burdock Hooffield", "Street Rat", "Spiral Notepad", and "Ginger Locks". His cutie mark is a cracked cogwheel.

characters.name:
Fruit Seller
S09E24 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: A Canterlot fruit seller in The Ending of the End - Part 1. Voiced by Nicole Oliver.

characters.name:
Baker Pony
S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a baker during Twilight Sparkle's coronation ceremony. He is a character named "Canterlot Baker" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during "The Pinkie Parents Problem" event. His bio states "We bet he and Joe swap fancy donut recipes all the time." Voiced by Peter New.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Ponyville. Shares his design and eye color with S08E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 and his design with S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2. His cutie mark appears to be two lollipops.

characters.name:
Future-Looking Friendship Student
S09E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a future student at the School of Friendship. He is a character named "Future-Looking Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Prank to the Future Part Two" event. His in-game bio states "The School of Friendship's future student body counts creatures of all kinds--including ponies with an eye on generations yet to come."
